name: Wayne Burbank
text: Amazing Pizza! Fantastic service! Friendly staff! ... and they have one of the BEST delivery people on the PLANET!... especially that Bailey! Smart, motivated, driven, efficient, talented, friendly, courteous, did I mention hard working? â€¦More

name: Amy Blair
text: Should never have gotten rid of animated shows. Its just not the same!! Dont like the time limit cards either. Food was really good and fresh.

name: Andrew Cheramie
text: I'm always glad to see that the service is always respectable and the people are quick with their work. I am a very satisfied customer I look forward to doing more business with Hungry Howie's.

name: Catherine Newsome
text: Ordered  well ahead, nearly an hour ahead. Only to get there and find out they haven't even started making my pizza. Manager wasn't even wearing a mask, even though the employees were. Ordered ahead to avoid standing amongst the way too many people in the lobby. Seems like people forget we're in the middle of a pandemic.

text: The albion location has done a great job every time I call. Unlike the location that is 2 blocks from my work that said an hour to deliver the last time I went to order or 20 minutes if I came and picked it up. Will only buy from Albion from here on out.
